NG0717:1: 'byung po'i rig sngags thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin /
NG0717:2: sems rtse gcig tu bsdus la legs par nyon cig / sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs //
NG0717:3: kun gyis bstan par ma gyur pa'i //
NG0717:4: rig sngags bsrung dang 'gugs pa dang *//
NG0717:5: de yi las ni 'di yin te //
NG0717:6: stong la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NG0717:7: bdag gi phyag rgya rab gnas te //
NG0717:8: snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng *//
NG0717:9: 'bar ba'i yi ge hum dang ldan //
NG0717:12: 'dus pa'i dbang dang ldan gyur nas //
NG0717:14: hum kro d+ha badzra sa ma ya hum /
NG0717:15: 'di gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas
NG0717:16: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis
NG0717:18: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes sku gsung
NG0717:19: thugs gsang ba pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
NG0717:20: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0717:21: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
NG0717:22: sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:24: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:25: om sarba ta tha ga ta ka ya wa ka tsit+ta gu h+ya sa ma ya hum /
NG0717:26: 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi
NG0717:27: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyid
NG0717:28: kyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur to //
NG0717:29: de'i tshe 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon
NG0717:30: po can gyi sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las
NG0717:31: sprul pa dang */ yang sprul dang */
NG0717:32: tsha tsha khrug par gyur to //
NG0717:33: thog chen po rnam pa lnga'ang 'bab par gyur to //
NG0717:34: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyis //
NG0717:35: mngon par spro ba'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te /
NG0717:36: gsang ba mngon par spro ba'i byed pa zhes bya ba'-i sngags 'di //
NG0717:37: nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang */
NG0717:38: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:39: om sarba ta tha ga ta ka ya wa ka
NG0717:40: tsit+ta dz+nya na gu h+ya na badzra kro d+ha ni
NG0717:41: lam wa gar hum phat phat /
NG0717:43: 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
NG0717:44: khams mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad khro bo'i
NG0717:45: dkyil 'khor gyis gang bar gyur to //
NG0717:46: de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'ur 'ur /
NG0717:49: rnam par dma' ba'i bar du'o //
NG0717:50: de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'di'i bdud
NG0717:51: dang bdud kyi ris kyi 'byung po thams cad dang
NG0717:52: */ ma mo las gyur ba'i bar du g.yos par gyur to //
NG0717:53: de'i tshe 'khor gyi nang nas nor lha'i bus gsol ba /
NG0717:54: sgeg po dpa' bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
NG0717:55: khyod mthong pas ni bdag cag 'jigs //
NG0717:56: yod min med pa ma yin nas //
NG0717:57: mnar med pa la thug gi bar //
NG0717:58: khyod kyi sgra yang thos kyi bar //
NG0717:59: 'jigs shing skying bung rab byed pas //
NG0717:62: mngon par rtogs pa'i 'khor lo bskor //
NG0717:63: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
NG0717:65: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje g.yo ba med pa'i ngang la gnas par gyur to //
NG0717:66: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bsdu ba'i
NG0717:67: thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te
NG0717:68: // de'i tshe gsang ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:70: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:71: om sarba ta tha ga ta badzra sa nan dza /
NG0717:73: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur to //
NG0717:74: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas //
NG0717:75: la la ni dpal rdo rje gos sngon can du gyur te /
NG0717:77: la la ni rin chen gos sngon can du gyur te /
NG0717:79: la la ni dpal pad+ma gos sngon can du gyur te /
NG0717:81: la la ni las kyi khro bor gyur te /
NG0717:83: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
NG0717:84: stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na //
NG0717:86: gsang ba bdag po'i sprul pa'i sku //
NG0717:87: thams cad 'di las gzhan du min //
NG0717:89: de nas 'khor rnams gyi nang nas byang chub sems
NG0717:90: dpa' rin chen tog ces bya ba des 'di skad
NG0717:91: ces gsol to // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag / yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
NG0717:92: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po mchog / bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol //
NG0717:93: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:94: phyag na rdo rjes gti mug rnam par 'joms pa
NG0717:95: zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
NG0717:96: // khro bo rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:98: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:99: om sarba ta tha ga ta badzra kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:100: 'di gsungs ma thag tu gti mug thams cad rnam par dag par gyur to //
NG0717:101: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes nga rgyal
NG0717:102: rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
NG0717:104: rin po che'i rigs kyi khro bo gos sngon po'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:106: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:107: om sarba ta tha ga ta radan kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:108: 'di gsungs ma thag tu nga rgyal thams cad rnam par dag par gyur to //
NG0717:109: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes 'dod chags
NG0717:110: kyis 'ching ba sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
NG0717:112: pad+ma'i rigs kyi khro bo gos sngon po can gyi sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:114: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:115: om sarba ta tha ga ta pad+ma kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:116: 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag par gyur to //
NG0717:117: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes phrag dog
NG0717:118: yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
NG0717:120: las kyi rigs kyi khro bo gos sngon po can gyi sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:122: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:123: om sarba ta tha ga ta karma kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:124: 'di gsungs ma thag tu phrag dog thams cad rnam par dag par gyur to //
NG0717:125: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes 'dod chags
NG0717:126: chen po'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
NG0717:128: rdo rje chung ma'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:130: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:131: om ni lam ba ra badzra kro d+hi shwa ri hum /
NG0717:132: om ni lam ba ra badzra radan kro d+hi shwa ri hum /
NG0717:133: om ni lam ba ra pad+ma kri d+hi shwa ri hum /
NG0717:134: om ni lam ba ra karma kro d+hi shwa ri hum /
NG0717:135: 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'phags pa phyogs bzhi'i khro
NG0717:136: bo thams cad 'dod chags chen pos tshim par 'gyur
NG0717:137: ro // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan
NG0717:138: thos yang dag par song ba la sogs pa thams
NG0717:139: cad bred sha thon nas mig bgrad te /
NG0717:140: bred pa'i stobs kyis gom pa gya tshom du 'dor bar byed do //
NG0717:141: de'i tshe de dag thams cad brgyal bar gyur to //
NG0717:142: mkha' 'gro ma dang srin po la sogs pa thams
NG0717:143: cad shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis stan las langs
NG0717:144: te / thal mo sbyar nas phyag byed /
NG0717:145: bskor ba byed ngo mtshar gyis dga' bas bstod pa'i bar du byed do //
NG0717:146: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes /
NG0717:147: khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la bltas
NG0717:148: pas go bar gyur nas dril bu'i sgras brgyal ba
NG0717:149: bsrang ste / dran pa slar rnyed nas /
NG0717:152: 'dod chags dang bral bdag nyid kyang *//
NG0717:153: ma yin spyod pa ma mdzad par //
NG0717:154: rtag tu yang dag chos la spyod //
NG0717:157: dngos por gyur pa'i chos rnams ni //
NG0717:158: rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa dag / thams cad dag par sems can la //
NG0717:159: chags dang ma chags gnyis las 'das //
NG0717:160: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //
NG0717:162: 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam par dag / dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med phyir //
NG0717:163: thabs dang shes rab 'brel par snang *//
NG0717:165: de nas 'phags pa rdo rje gos sngon gyis gsol pa /
NG0717:166: gti mug dang bral 'dod chags sbyor ba 'dis //
NG0717:167: ma chags de yi ngang yang mi dmigs so //
NG0717:168: dbyings dang ye shes 'brel pas rdo rje pad+mar 'brel //
NG0717:169: sbrul pa'i sku 'byung chos dbyings b+ha gas mtshon par byed //
NG0717:171: de nas 'phags pa rin chen gos sngon gyis gsol pa /
NG0717:172: nga rgyal rnam par dag pas yon tan thams cad 'byung *//
NG0717:173: legs sbyangs btsun mo bsten pas yon tan thams cad phob //
NG0717:174: 'dod chags nyid na ma chags bde ba ngang gis skye //
NG0717:175: de rten 'bras bu sangs rgyas byang chub sa la reg / ces gsungs so //
NG0717:176: de nas pad+ma gos sngon gyis gsol pa //
NG0717:179: de ni 'dam gyi skyon gyis gos pa med //
NG0717:180: de bzhin btsun mo rnams la mang rten kyang *//
NG0717:181: 'od chags rnam par dag pas gos mi 'gyur //
NG0717:183: de nas las kyi gos sngon gyis gsol ba /
NG0717:184: thugs rje smon lam shugs kyis sems can mngon sum na //
NG0717:185: khro mo yum dang gnyis med sbyor zhing chags pa'i tshul //
NG0717:186: sems can 'dod la dga' ba bla med lam la
NG0717:187: 'jug / tha dad rtog dang bral bas chags pa
NG0717:189: de skad ces gsungs ma thag tu 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor thams cad yid rab tu dga' ste /
NG0717:190: ngo mtshar gyi dga' bas bstod pa /
NG0717:191: rigs rnams kun gyi bdag po ste /
NG0717:192: rigs kyi khro bo kun gyi ngang *//
NG0717:193: rtag tu mya ngan 'das pa las //
NG0717:194: sems can don byed phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0717:195: gti mug mun pa dang bral zhing *//
NG0717:196: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gsal //
NG0717:197: dkar la mdzes pa'i sku ston pa //
NG0717:198: 'dod chags rnam dag khyod la bstod //
NG0717:199: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu las //
NG0717:202: bde ba thob pa phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0717:204: 'dam gyi skyon gyis mi gos ltar //
NG0717:205: 'dod chags che la rab gnas kyang *//
NG0717:206: log rtog skyon med khyod la bstod //
NG0717:207: ji ltar shes rab ral gri yis //
NG0717:208: rtog pa'i dra ba rab gcod cing *//
NG0717:209: 'dod chags can rnams bde la dgod //
NG0717:210: sna tshogs don mdzad khyod la bstod //
NG0717:211: ces gsungs nas thams cad lhan to //
NG0717:212: de nas 'phags pa gos sngon can gyis //
NG0717:213: sku'i phyag rgya chen po yongs su rdzogs pa rdo
NG0717:214: rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
NG0717:215: zhugs te // 'di skad ces gsungs so //
NG0717:216: dkar dmar mthing kha ljang khu'i zhal //
NG0717:217: 'od zer bye ba stong dang ldan //
NG0717:218: shar phyogs rgyal rigs gdeng ka can //
NG0717:219: lho yi khro bos rje 'us brgyan //
NG0717:220: nub kyi bram ze'i gdeng ka can //
NG0717:221: byang phyogs dmangs rigs gdeng kas ldan //
NG0717:223: rgya gram g.yas na bsnams pa ste //
NG0717:224: ston pa'i phyag na dril bu bsnams //
NG0717:225: gos sngon po yi sham thabs can //
NG0717:226: so so'i khro mo chen mo ni //
NG0717:227: g.yas pa'i dril bu thugs kar bstan //
NG0717:228: g.yon pa ban dmar khrag chen stobs //
NG0717:231: sems can nyen par ldan pa dag / 'di yi ming tsam thos pa na //
NG0717:232: sgra skad thos pas smos ci dgos //
NG0717:233: gal te bka' las 'das gyur na //
NG0717:234: rnam par snang mdzad nyid kyang 'chi //
NG0717:236: de nas yang 'phags pa gos sngon po can gyis /
NG0717:237: rin po che mngon par 'grub pa rdo rje zhes
NG0717:238: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
NG0717:240: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
NG0717:243: don dang yi ge gnyis su 'brel //
NG0717:244: bsgoms bas log rtog dra ba gcod //
NG0717:245: ces gsungs so /    / de nas 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor de dag gi nang nas /
NG0717:246: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba
NG0717:247: sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bstan las langs
NG0717:248: te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol to //
NG0717:249: e ma ho sangs rgyas bcomaldan 'das //
NG0717:250: sgrib pa grol ba'i thabs mnga' zhing *//
NG0717:251: log rtog dra ba thams cad gcod //
NG0717:252: gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig tshul //
NG0717:253: bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol //
NG0717:255: 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
NG0717:256: legs so legs so legs par gsungs //
NG0717:257: kun nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir //
NG0717:258: gang dag nyon mongs sel ba'i thabs //
NG0717:259: bdud rtsi chu bo'i rgyun 'dra ba //
NG0717:260: ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya //
NG0717:261: sems can thams cad ma lus la //
NG0717:262: sgo nga'i tshul dang yang dag ldan //
NG0717:263: bcod pa'i rtsal gri chen po yis //
NG0717:264: dngos po'i sgo nga'i sbubs rnams 'byed //
NG0717:265: ji ltar shel sgo 'dam bcug la //
NG0717:266: dag pa'i chu yis 'khru ba bzhin //
NG0717:268: bla med thar pa'i lam gyi mchog / bdud rtsi'i chu yis 'khru bar byed //
NG0717:269: yang dag rdzogs dang rab ldan pas //
NG0717:270: bdud rtsi'i chu bo rgyun byung ba //
NG0717:271: de yi bsam pa'i rim pa ni //
NG0717:272: dang por yi ge om dkar las //
NG0717:273: 'od byung khams gsum thams cad khyab //
NG0717:274: slar 'dus om gyi dbyings su bstim //
NG0717:275: de las 'od byung sangs rgyas rnams //
NG0717:276: bskul nas sbyor ba'i byang chub sems //
NG0717:277: phab pas lus kyi bag chags rnams //
NG0717:278: dag par gyur bsam rdo rje bzhin //
NG0717:279: gnas nas spyi bo gtsug nas byung *//
NG0717:280: gnyis pa'i yi ge a dmar las //
NG0717:282: slar 'dus a yi dbyings su thim //
NG0717:283: de las 'od byung gong ma bzhin //
NG0717:284: gnas ni mgrin pa'i dkyil nas 'byung *//
NG0717:285: gsum pa'i yi ge hum mthing gis //
NG0717:287: lus ngag sems kyi sgrib pa dag / bsam gtan brtan par myur du 'byung *//
NG0717:288: mchog dang thun mong kun gyi rgyu //
NG0717:289: gang zhig bsam gtan 'di ldan nas //
NG0717:290: gzhogs skams pa dang yan lag na //
NG0717:291: de la sogs pa kun las grol //
NG0717:292: snying khar chu skyes rab bsams te //
NG0717:293: dbus su thig le dkar po bsam //
NG0717:294: mtha' mar dang pa'-i yi ge brgyad //
NG0717:295: ci rigs gsal nas so so yi //
NG0717:296: thig ler gyur te rang bzhin med //
NG0717:297: des ni sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur //
NG0717:299: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las //
NG0717:300: gtan la phab pa'i rtog pa ste le'u dang po'o
NG0717:301: // // de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje
NG0717:303: rdo rje gsang ba zhi ba sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms @#//
NG0717:306: ji ltar zhi ba'i las rnams dag / zhi ba'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi //
NG0717:307: thabs bzhan 'di las bzhan na med //
NG0717:308: 'di ni zhi ba'i sbyor ba mchog / om badzra
NG0717:309: pa ni hum ni lam ba ra shan+ti ku ru
NG0717:310: swa ha de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje
NG0717:312: rdo rje rgyas par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te //
NG0717:314: gser dang nyi ma'i sbyor ba yis //
NG0717:315: tshad med bzhi yi 'bras bu la //
NG0717:316: rgyas par byas na rgyas par 'gyur //
NG0717:317: om badzra pa ni hum ni lam ba ra rat+na push+tam ku ru ho //
NG0717:318: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje //
NG0717:319: rdo rje dbang gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:321: bye ru tshul gyi sbyor ba yis //
NG0717:322: zla gam ba yi dbyibs 'dra la //
NG0717:323: dbang du byas na dbang du 'gyur //
NG0717:325: om badzra pa ni hum ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:326: pa sham ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:327: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes /
NG0717:328: gsang ba'i rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:330: dug dang sol ba 'dres pa la //
NG0717:331: b+ha ga'i dbyibs su rab byas te //
NG0717:332: gsad pa byas na gsad pa 'grub //
NG0717:334: om na ma badzra pa ni hum /
NG0717:335: ni lam ba ra ma ra ya /
NG0717:336: na sha ya na sha ya hum phat /
NG0717:337: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las //
NG0717:338: gtan la dbab pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o ///
NG0717:339: / de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyis /
NG0717:340: rdo rje ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:342: rab tu brtags pa'i gnas chen du //
NG0717:343: las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnam bzhi la //
NG0717:344: rigs bzhi'i shing gis khrir byas te //
NG0717:345: zhal du gyur dang me bos la //
NG0717:346: ram zhes bya bas me spar te //
NG0717:347: mchod dang bstod pa dbul ba ni //
NG0717:348: dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi bdag nyid can //
NG0717:349: gang dmigs dngos po gang yang 'grub //
NG0717:350: thogs pa med pa rdo rje bzhin //
NG0717:352: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes /
NG0717:353: drang ba sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:355: phyag rgya gsum gyi bdag nyid can //
NG0717:356: spyi bo zla ba'i gdan stengs su //
NG0717:357: bam las byung ba'i chu rgyun bsam //
NG0717:358: lus rnams shin tu bsil 'gyur che'o //
NG0717:359: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes *//
NG0717:360: mi g.yo ba bsgrub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0717:361: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brug sgra sprin gyi rgyal pos gsol ba //
NG0717:362: bcom ldan 'das mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin lhun grub kyang */
NG0717:363: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
NG0717:364: dngos po'i sku ru rab bzhengs la //
NG0717:365: yang dag bdud rtsi gsal du gsol //
NG0717:368: bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
NG0717:370: om na mo ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:371: che ge mo ku ru bam /
NG0717:372: om sarba ta tha ga ta ka ya pa ka tsit+ta /
NG0717:374: ku ru kha kha ha ha /
NG0717:378: na sha ya na sha ya /
NG0717:381: ma ra ya ma ra ya /
NG0717:382: hum phat na ga ba twan stan pa ni hum phat /
NG0717:383: na ga ra dza pa ra bid dwan ban+d+ha ban+d+ha /
NG0717:385: zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so //
NG0717:386: de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo yangs bzang po
NG0717:387: 'brug sgra sprin gyi rgyal pos thal mo sbyar te
NG0717:388: / phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0717:389: kye ma phyag na rdo rje chen po //
NG0717:390: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba /
NG0717:391: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs thams cad thob pa //
NG0717:392: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste /
NG0717:393: 'di'i gzungs 'di ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
NG0717:396: thams cad kyi las thogs pa med par mdzad pa /
NG0717:397: mngon par shes pa thams cad myur du thob par byed pa /
NG0717:398: 'byung po thams cad kyi rig sngags gcod pa /
NG0717:399: 'byung po thams cad kyi snying snon pa /
NG0717:400: log par lta ba thams cad myur du 'gugs par byed pa /
NG0717:401: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa /
NG0717:402: mthu chen po myur du 'byung ba'o //
NG0717:403: byang chub sems dpa' blo yangs zab mo 'brug sgrogs
NG0717:404: sprin gyi rgyal pos de skad ces gsol ma thag
NG0717:405: tu / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang 'di skad ces gsungs so //
NG0717:406: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mthu chen thob //
NG0717:407: yang dag bstan pa'i gzungs 'di shin tu mthu dang rdzu 'phrul che //
NG0717:408: gang zhig 'dzin pa la ni yon tan thams cad ldan //
NG0717:409: legs pa'i don sgrub rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0717:411: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje bstan pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0717:412: kye ma bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang */
NG0717:414: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga bdag cag la stsal du gsol /
NG0717:415: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:417: dbang du sdud pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:418: sbyor ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:420: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:421: om sarba big+h+nan ma ra ya ban d+ha ban d+ha badzra bam d+ha hum phat //
NG0717:422: na mo po ta ku ru sa ma ya hum phat /
NG0717:424: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba des bstod pa /
NG0717:425: gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can //
NG0717:427: thogs med rdo rje'i don ldan pa //
NG0717:430: de nas khro bo nam mkha' lding nye bar 'joms
NG0717:431: pa rdo rje zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces
NG0717:433: ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams na ma rungs pa'i
NG0717:434: klu thams cad kyis sems can rnams la 'tshe bar
NG0717:437: 'di dag 'joms pa'i thabs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba bdag la bstan du gsol /
NG0717:438: de skad gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:439: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes dag pa
NG0717:440: sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
NG0717:441: par zhugs so // ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
NG0717:442: dag par byed ba bdud rtsi'i rgyun zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang */
NG0717:443: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:444: om sarba ta tha ga ta na ga ra dza sa ma ya hum /
NG0717:445: swa b+ha ba shud+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha bi shud d+ho\u0f85 ham /
NG0717:447: de nas yang 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes /
NG0717:448: rdo rje sreg par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0717:449: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
NG0717:450: sreg par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:452: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:453: om na mo ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:454: sarba na ga ra dza rak+sha rak+sha /
NG0717:459: stong gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
NG0717:460: cad du rdo rje me yis khyab par gyur to
NG0717:461: // de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos
NG0717:462: sngon po can gyi cho 'phrul rnam par 'byung ba
NG0717:463: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
NG0717:464: // par zhugs so // ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
NG0717:465: cho 'phrul sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:467: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:468: om badzra pa ni ma ha ya ka se na pa ta ye /
NG0717:469: badzra kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:470: na ga grih+na grih+na hum phat /
NG0717:471: na ga ha na ha na hum phat /
NG0717:472: na ga ra k+sha s+pho ta s+pho ta hum phat /
NG0717:473: na ga ni na ga ni sum ba ku+u ru hum phat /
NG0717:474: om ni lam ku ru ba ya b+ha ga ban hum phat /
NG0717:475: na ga ni ni bi na sha ka ra ya hum phat /
NG0717:476: om gardza gardza na ga gardza hum phat /
NG0717:477: om tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha na ga yak+sha tshin+d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:478: om ba ling ni twa sa ma ya hum phat /
NG0717:479: om hu lu hu lu na ga hu lu hum phat /
NG0717:480: om tish+tha tish+tha na ga tish+tha hum phat /
NG0717:481: om ku ru ku ru na ga pa sham ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:482: om ban d+ha ban d+ha na ga ra dza sarba bi ban+d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:484: de nas khro bo nam mkha' lding nye bar 'joms pas /
NG0717:485: 'phags pa gos sngon po can la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do //
NG0717:486: kye ma rdo rje gos sngon can //
NG0717:490: 'khor thams cad la de dag gi sngags 'di brjod do //
NG0717:491: e ma ho gzungs chen po 'di dag ni /
NG0717:494: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa /
NG0717:495: klu ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs par byed pa /
NG0717:496: klu'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'du bar byed na /
NG0717:497: kha rlangs kyi nam mkha'i sprin thams @#//
NG0717:499: rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrug par byed pa /
NG0717:500: klu'i rgyal pos byas pa'i rig sngags la sogs pa gcog cing 'ching bar byed pa ste /
NG0717:501: kye ma gzungs 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba /
NG0717:502: 'di ltar bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'o zhes bstod do //
NG0717:503: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te /
NG0717:504: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0717:505: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems
NG0717:506: can gyi ris thams cad la lha'i gdon du gyur
NG0717:507: pa thams cad kyis bgegs bgyid //
NG0717:510: srog dang bral bar bgyid de //
NG0717:511: 'di gang gis bzlog pa'i cho ga bdag la bstan du gsol //
NG0717:512: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:514: rdo rje brjid pa sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0717:515: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
NG0717:516: steng gi khro bo 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:518: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:519: om de ba mu la pa ti hum /
NG0717:520: om de ba ra dza hum /
NG0717:521: om de ba ra dza ni lam ba ra ma ha yak+sha se na pa ti hum /
NG0717:522: sarba de ba ra dza gardza gardza hum phat /
NG0717:523: sarba de ba ra dza s+pho ta s+pho ta hum phat /
NG0717:524: de ba ra dza ba ra bid twa na ma ra ya ma ra ya hum phat /
NG0717:525: de ba ni ba ra bid tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:526: de ba ra dza sarba bi twa na ha sa ha sa hum phat /
NG0717:527: d+ha ra d+ha ra hum phat /
NG0717:528: pa shang ku ru pa sham ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:529: om de ba ku la pa ra bi twan mu ru mu ru hum phat /
NG0717:531: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur med rdo rje zhes bya ba stan las langs te /
NG0717:533: lha rnams 'dul ba'i stobs chen po //
NG0717:534: gang phyir thogs med gsang sngags ldan //
NG0717:535: phan thogs sku gsung sna tshogs thugs //
NG0717:536: stong gi bgegs zlog khyod la bstod //
NG0717:538: gang gi 'khor rnams la gzungs 'di sngags pa byed par 'gyur te /
NG0717:539: kye ma gzungs 'di ni mthu dang gzi byin che ba /
NG0717:541: bar du gcod pa dang lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa /
NG0717:542: dbang phyug chen po dang b+h+rim gi ri ti la
NG0717:543: sogs pas byas pa'i rig sngags thams cad gcod par
NG0717:544: bgyid pa / rig sngags thams cad bzlog par bgyid pa /
NG0717:545: rig sngags thams cad 'gug par bgyid pa /
NG0717:546: lha thams cad kyi snying mnan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'o //
NG0717:547: de nas 'khor gzhan gyis bstod pa /
NG0717:548: ji ltar shes rab ral gris nyon mongs gcod pa bzhin //
NG0717:549: gdug byed thams cad rab tu grags pa'i sngags kyis gcod par byed //
NG0717:550: lha dang lha las gyur pa'i gdon bzlog thogs pa med //
NG0717:551: yon tan kun ldan gzungs khyod la ni phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0717:553: de nas byang chub sems dpa' tog brtsegs kyis gsol pa /
NG0717:555: gyi khams 'di na gnod sbyin dang */
NG0717:556: gdon sbyin gyi rigs su gtogs pa 'di lta ste /
NG0717:557: gang po dang mig bzangs la sogs pas sems can rnams la gnod par bgyid /
NG0717:560: srog dang bral bar bgyid na /
NG0717:561: bcom ldan 'das de dag las thar bar mdzad du gsol /
NG0717:562: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:563: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can /
NG0717:564: rdo rje rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:565: gnod sbyin thams cad kyi lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:567: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:568: om na ma sa man+ta ka ya waka tsit+ta badzra
NG0717:569: pa ni ma ha ya k+sha se na pa ti
NG0717:570: badzra kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:571: ma ha yak+sha ha na ha na hum phat /
NG0717:572: da ha da ha ma ha yak+sha da ha ni hum phat /
NG0717:573: pa tsa pa tsa yak+sha ra dza pa tsa ni badzra hum phat /
NG0717:574: ma tha ma tha sarba yak+sha ma tha ni badzra hum phat /
NG0717:575: grih+na grih+na yak+sha grih+na ni badzra hum phat /
NG0717:576: yak+sha bid twan ma ra ya ma ra ya hum phat /
NG0717:577: ka ra ka ra bi ka ra yak+sha pho ta ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:579: de nas byang chub sems dpa' tog brtsegs kyis bstod pa /
NG0717:580: gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i skur ston pa /
NG0717:581: gnod sbyin gtso bo gos sngon can //
NG0717:582: gang phyir gnod sbyin 'dul kha'i skur ston pa //
NG0717:583: bde bas brgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0717:585: rang gi 'khor rnams la gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par bgyid de /
NG0717:586: kye ma gzungs 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
NG0717:588: gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa /
NG0717:589: gnod sbyin gyi rigs thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid pa /
NG0717:590: gnod sbyin gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par bgyid
NG0717:591: pa / gnod sbyin las gyur pa'i gdon thams cad
NG0717:594: de nas de'i 'khor rnams kyis gzungs 'di la bstod pa /
NG0717:595: gang dag gnod sbyin gyi ni nyen gyis zin gyur pa /
NG0717:596: de yi bdag po gsang sngags 'di ni thos pas
NG0717:597: sreg / 'joms pa'i thob zhes su gang gis gsungs
NG0717:598: pa de / ston pa sngags dang bcas pa gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0717:600: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi bdag 'joms pa zhes bya ba des /
NG0717:602: kye ma bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams na gshin rje dang *//
NG0717:603: gshin rje las gyur pa'i bgegs thams cad kyis /
NG0717:604: sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog pa /
NG0717:608: srog dang bral bar bgyid na /
NG0717:609: bcom ldan 'das de dag las thar par mdzad du gsol //
NG0717:610: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:611: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can //
NG0717:612: 'joms pa chen po gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:614: rje thams cad kyi lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:616: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:617: om sarba ta tha ga ta ka ya wa ka tsit+ta badzra pa ni hum //
NG0717:618: badzra kro d+ha ni lam ba ra ya ma sarba ta ka ban d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:619: om ya ma ka la tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:620: om ya ma ra dza grih+na grih+na hum phat /
NG0717:621: om ma ha ya ma pa la s+phot s+phot hum phat /
NG0717:622: om ya ma rak+sha tsu ru tsu ru hum phat /
NG0717:623: ya ma bid twan karma rba na hum phat /
NG0717:624: sarba karma ku ru ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:626: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi bdag 'joms pa de /
NG0717:627: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do //
NG0717:628: bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can //
NG0717:629: thams cad gshin rje 'dul ba po //
NG0717:630: gang phyir gshin rje'i gsang 'di bshad /
NG0717:631: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod /
NG0717:633: 'khor thams cad la gzungs 'di'i bsngags brjod do //
NG0717:634: kye ma gzungs 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba /
NG0717:637: bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pa /
NG0717:638: nag po'i gshin rje thams cad gcod pa /
NG0717:639: gshin rje'i rgyal po thams cad 'dzin par byed pa /
NG0717:640: gshin rje stobs che ba thams cad gnon par byed pa /
NG0717:641: gshin rje'i rig sngags thams cad myur du zlog par byed pa yin no //
NG0717:643: de nas 'phags pa'i 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis bstod pa /
NG0717:644: sems can 'og ma rnams kyis shin tu rtogs dka' ba //
NG0717:645: mkhas pas byang chub chen po'i phyir ni sems bskyed nas /
NG0717:646: gshin rje las na rje las gyur 'byung po bzlog pa'i phyir //
NG0717:647: gsungs pa'i gzungs khyod la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
NG0717:649: de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal bas gsol ba /
NG0717:650: byang chub chen po thar phyin pas /
NG0717:651: gsungs pa'i gzungs sngags rgyal po 'di //
NG0717:652: bsam gtan 'khor lo dang ldan na //
NG0717:654: gang zhig dpal ldan skur gnas nas /
NG0717:655: bka' bsgo'i don phyir sngags gsungs pa //
NG0717:657: gos sngon rtsa ba'i skur gyur nas //
NG0717:658: rnam par rgyal dang bdud rtsi 'khyil //
NG0717:659: rta mgrin dang ni gshin rje gshed /
NG0717:660: de la sogs pa'i sprul par ldan //
NG0717:661: som nyi yid gnyis ldan pa yis //
NG0717:663: dad pa dam tshig yang dag ldan //
NG0717:664: bla ma la gus mchod la brtson //
NG0717:665: stong pa don la dmigs pa yis //
NG0717:666: bred sha thon nas stong gsum gyi //
NG0717:668: mkha' 'gro dang ni ma mo kun //
NG0717:669: gnod pa gang yang mi byed cing *//
NG0717:670: phan pa chen po sgrub par byed //
NG0717:672: nyes pa kun las rab tu thar //
NG0717:673: legs pa yon tan thams cad thog / drang srong chen po myur du 'grub //
NG0717:674: tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu bsam //
NG0717:675: de ltar gyur na dngos grub 'gyur //
NG0717:677: lag na rdo rje gos sngon @#//
NG0717:679: rdo rje rtse mo'i las kyi gzungs chen po'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ///
NG0717:680: / de nas lha'i bus gsol pa /
NG0717:681: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rgyud las /
NG0717:682: don dang yi ge kun 'das don ston pa //
NG0717:683: 'di ni kun gyi thun mong ma yin te /
NG0717:684: / gang zag theg pa chen po'i rigs dang ldan
NG0717:685: // spyod pa'i don la dad pa yang dag skye //
NG0717:686: lus dang srog la bla ma mnyam par bya //
NG0717:687: rtag tu legs pa'i don la spyod //
NG0717:688: brtan pa ma thob kun rdzob chos //
NG0717:689: spyod rdzogs brtan pa thob nas de nyid ngang la gnas //
NG0717:690: dam pa'i chos ston byang chub sems dang ldan //
NG0717:691: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po bsgom //
NG0717:692: de yi chos bzhin gzhan gyi spyod yul min //
NG0717:693: rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud //
NG0717:694: rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa kun las btus //
NG0717:695: gsang don nye bar 'byed las nyer 'byed rgyud //
NG0717:696: sho lo ka 'bum gyi cha gnyis bka' stsal pa //
NG0717:697: dur khrod phug na bka' rtags phyag rgya btab //
NG0717:698: skal ba med pas su yi spyod yul min //
NG0717:699: bdag gis legs par bsgrubs pa'i byin brlabs kyis //
NG0717:700: rtse mo dum bu'i rgyud 'di dur khrod che //
NG0717:701: gnod sbyin phug nas sems can don du blangs //
NG0717:702: 'di la brten nas gos sngon dngos grub gnyis //
NG0717:703: sems can gyi thob nas bla med byang chub thob //
NG0717:704: a tsar+ya g.yu sgra dpal bzher gyis zhal mnga' nas kyis phyung ba'o //
NG0717:706: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
